transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji, ji. Now it's audible na sir?
Customer: Ji, ab aa raha hai, ab aa rahi hai.
Executive: Haan, ab udhar se mute kar dijiye aap ek baar apne desktop se, main aapko dikha de rahi hu. Basically sir, ye jo aap yaha pe apne, apne desktop pe aap system ko mute kar dijiye sir, matlab mute jo hai isko mute kar dijiye.
Customer: Awaaz aa rahi hai? Kar diya na mute aapne?
Executive: Haan, kar diya.
Customer: Haan, kar diya. Basically dekhiye aapne, aap apne left side dekhiyega yaha pe dashboard, profile, lead manager, products, products drop aur invoice aur buyer tools and settings karke options aa rahe honge na sir?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ye yaha pe check karega, ye.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Theek hai? Screen share hai na meri?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai? To basically yaha pe aap na apne profile pe jaake na sir, jaise aapko koi bhi issue hai na, aapko ye number add nahi karna, hatana hai, theek hai? Ye aap jaake yaha pe aap na add kar sakte hai sir, theek hai? Aur aapko agar Gmail pe add karna hai alternative ke liye, aap yaha pe bhi add kar sakte hai. Theek hai sir, basically aur apne bank details jo bhi aapko add karna hai, aap kar sakte hai yaha pe jitna dikh raha hai sir. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Haan, aur additional details mein bhi jaan lijiye sir. Isme ye jaake hoga sir, apne address, number jo bhi aapko karna hai, aap wo kar sakte hai sir. Theek hai? Yaha pe aap business card ki bhi apni koi apna business card hai aapka?
Customer: Ye hai.
Executive: To yaha pe aap isko add photo kar sakte hai. Theek hai, basically yaha pe jaake.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Theek hai? Aur yaha pe bhi aap ye kar sakte hai, website aapke saare yaha pe direct show karega aapko saari jitne bhi home pages hai aapke about jo bhi aapki company ke baare mein jo bhi aapko membership quality content jitni saari cheeze aapko yaha pe show karegi, theek hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aur raha ye, ye aapka dusra lead manager. Jaise aap yaha pe check kar pa rahe hai na, ye all contact show kar raha hai eight. Aapne abhi tak aath in ye sab dekhiye in sab se baat ki thi na aapne?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Ye show ho raha hai direct aapne aap koi connect kiye honge lead manager ke through. Lead manager ke through ye hota hai na, aap yaha pe reminders dekh sakte hai, aap reminder lag. Ye kya aap, maine nahi kiya tha ye luxury ka sabali.
Customer: Ye kiya nahi hai, ye unhone aapko aapne call set reminder laga rakha hai.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Ye aapko connect kiya hai unhone.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Jo directly karte hai na calls wo aapko yaha pe show karte hai. Calls call reminder set for 12 12 baje ka hai aapka. Aapne kiya kya inse baat koi baat hui thi inse?
Customer: Nahi, kisi se inse to nahi hui thi meri baat.
Executive: Achha achha. Call call. Ek ke luxury ka.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Ek second rukiye.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Ab dekhiyega.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Aur ye calls hai hi nahi aapke paas. Reminder set karne ka option aata hai. Aap pehle ye jaan lijiye uske baad main aapko bata dungi kaun hai, theek hai? Theek hai? Ye reminders aap yaha se set kar sakte hai. Sir, basically kya hota hai na isme ki reminder aap jaise maan lijiye mere se baat hui, maine aapko directly connect kiya. Agar aapko kuch discuss karna hai fir apne business ke related, to aap yaha pe mere mere naam ka meri company ka name ka aap laga sakte hai reminder ki mujhe kal inse connect karna hai sir se. Theek hai? Aur aap past ka matlab ye hota hai jitna bhi aap jitne bhi previously aapne kiya hai connect wo show karega. Upcoming ka matlab hota hai jo aane wala hai aapne jo reminder laga rakha hai wo show hoga sir, theek hai?
Customer: Ye poore reminders maine to nahi set kiya, kya hai ye reminder?
Executive: Aur yaha pe aap click karenge done pe. Koi baat nahi, main abhi aapko saari cheeze bata dungi. Aap bilkul bhi pareshan na ho, theek hai? Abhi aap naye hai na to aapko thoda samajhne mein thoda wo lagega lekin main aapko saari cheeze sahi se bata de rahi hu. Agar koi bhi koi bhi jagah aapko doubt ho sir, aap mujhe rok ke turant puch sakte hai, theek hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Basically haan, basically yaha pe aap ye three line dikh rahi hai na aapko? Ispe click karke manage contact. Yaha pe aap contact add kar sakte hai. Theek hai? Jis bhi buyer se aapki baat hui to aap usko add kar sakte hai apne name ke saath, theek hai? Hidden contact kar sakte hai sir, matlab ki agar aap unse baat nahi karni ya kuch bhi aisa hai chat ya jo bhi hai aap usko kar sakte hai. Block contact ka matlab hota hai ki unse aapko baat karni hi nahi hai, theek hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ho gaya. Theek hai?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Aur yaha pe aap support and information aap dekh sakte hai. Theek hai? PI yaha pe dikh raha hoga performance report. Theek hai? Isme aapki saari performance dikhegi. Abhi to aapne live liya hai na services sir to aapke abhi show nahi ho rahi hai. Kyunki aapne term mere fingers karke yaha pe na aapne keval paanch jo top top category mein lead to consume kiye, ek kiye, ek calls aapke paas aayi hai. Ye show karega. Ye pura aap apna performance dekh sakte hai sir, theek hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ispe jaake ki aapne kitna kitni calls ki hai, kitni queries attend ki hai. Ab upar dekhiyega all queries aa gayi na yaha pe niche by week sections aayega. Aap ye check kar sakte hai by week aapne kitni consume ki hai, kitne ghante mein, kitne ghante ke gap pe aapne kitna kiya hai ye. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Team with the call. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai? Matlab kya hai? Aisa kya ye matlab hota hai. Sir, lead manager is the main man lijiye main segment hai iska. Agar aap ispe calls and reply sab jo bhi calls aa rahi hai aap ekdam miss mat karega. Jitni bhi replies aa rahi hai aap please usko reply karega, theek hai? Ye aapko saari dikh jayegi ki aapne kitna chhe mahine mein ya ek saal mein kitna reply uske saari reviews aapke dikh jayenge. Yaha pe review rating ka matlab kya hota hai sir? Basically agar aap reviews rating ka agar kisi buyer se connect hua hai, theek hai? Aapki abhi saari yaha pe reviews dikhenge. Abhi to aapko koi reviews mila nahi hai to isliye aapka paanch mein se zero dikh raha hoga sir. Theek hai? Aapki rating puri show hogi yaha pe. Abhi aapka koi yaha pe connect nahi hua hai isliye sab load load hai.
Customer: Review kaise badhta hai, kaise ghatta hai?
Executive: Main wo bhi bata rahi hu aapko kaise jaata hai. Ma, ye lead manager pe gaye, theek hai?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Ab maan lijiye aapki inse baat hui, ek ke luxury kya bole the, theek hai? Abhi niche dikh raha hai na chat catalog link. Product is available. Thanks for query. Share more details. Quantity and order value, theek hai? Ye show ho raha hai na aapko? What is what is the quantity? Theek hai? Basically aap ispe niche aur jayenge aur arrow badhayenge aur aur. Theek hai? Waha pe ek option aayega ask for the review sir. Theek hai? Ye dekhiye, ye aaya na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ask for the review. Ispe aap directly apne jo buyer hai, jo seller hai, aap unko bhej sakte hai client ko apne. Theek hai? Wo directly unke unke pe share ho jayega sir, theek hai? Wo aapko directly review de sakte hai. Theek hai? Aur aap bol sakte hai apna review kare. Ho sakta hai. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aur yaha pe haan, basically aap yaha catalog ke link share kar sakte hai apne product ke, theek hai? Ye bhi jo bhi aapko batana hai ki aapko product is available ki aapka product available hai to aap ye directly bhej sakte ho. Ye sab to aapko templates pata hi honge na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan, ye aisa use hota hai ki aapko short form mein set kar sakte hai. Hum idhar niche aage badhayenge na, ye option aayega ask for the review ye aapko maine bata hi diya isse aap karwa sakte hai. Please reviews ka aap bilkul bhi mat bhuliyega sir. Theek hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aur hai ye products. Aapka ye Nizamabad Nizamabad turmeric bulk turmeric bulk. Theek hai? Isme aapko kya karna hai sir? Aapke teen inactive products aapne jitne mark kar rakhe hai. Basically ye teeno aapne mark kar rakhe hai na? Ye products hai. Theek hai? Basically kya karna hai isme aapko descriptions add karne hai product ke. Jo bhi haldi ki qualities hai, jo bhi kya hai, jo bhi descriptions aapko add karne hai. Haldi ke baare mein jo specific pura aapko karna hai ki jisse ki aapke paas agar koi buyer aa raha hai to ye padh ke hi aayega na, product dekh ke hi aayega na. Agar aapne isko chhod
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Khali chhod diya. Hmm. Theek hai? Ye karna hai aapko. Aur yaha pe kya hai category add karni hai. Jaise aapne yaha pe add kiya na turmeric product. Turmeric fingers, turmeric powder kya hai? Kaise ji. Kaise aap deal aapka product kya hai sir ye powder mein hai ki aise hi hai?
Customer: Tin bhi hai, turmeric powder hai, finger hai, bulk hai.
Executive: Root bhi hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Hmm. Root bhi available hai?
Customer: Ji, kya?
Executive: Turmeric roots bhi available hai sir?
Customer: Haan, roots bhi available hai.
Executive: Haan, to ye aapko secondary actually turmeric root root root ya bulb jo bhi ek hi hai same hi hai.
Customer: Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs assistance with IndiaMART features.

- Customer unaware of call reminders in lead manager.

- Customer wants to know how reviews increase/decrease.

- Customer needs guidance on product descriptions.



Resolution:

- Executive explained profile update process.

- Executive clarified lead manager call reminder feature.

- Executive explained how to ask for reviews.

- Executive guided on adding product descriptions/categories.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- profile, lead manager, product, reviews, reminders
